title: Vacuum Cleaner DV-60
description: The DV-60 Vacuum Cleaner  is a Sturdy, high-capacity dry and wet cleaning machine designed for high-end performance in the industrial sector. With  motors of 2800W, which provide strong suction to take on everything from dust particles to liquid spills easily. The massive 60-liter stainless steel tank guarantees fewer interruptions in cleaning and more time-consuming cleaning cycles, making it the perfect solution for warehouses, factories, workshops, and large commercial areas.Created for durability and effectiveness, the DV-60 comes with robust wheels and an advanced filter system as well as the sleek design to ensure easy movement and operation. If you're working with a the tough industrial grime or commercial clean-up, DV-60 will be the perfect machine for strength, capacity, and dependability.
keyFeatures: Dual Function – Wet & Dry Cleaning – Efficiently handles both liquid spills and dry dust, making it ideal for versatile cleaning needs.
Compact Yet Powerful – Equipped with a 2800W high-suction motor to deliver strong and consistent performance.
60-Litre Durable Tank – Robust tank capacity ensures longer cleaning time with fewer interruptions.
Multi-Surface Cleaning – Perfect for cleaning floors, carpets, sofas, office spaces, workshops, and more.
Portable & Lightweight Design – Easy to move and operate with sturdy wheels and ergonomic handle.
Low Noise Operation – Designed to work efficiently with minimal noise – perfect for home and commercial use.
Easy Drainage System – Comes with a water drain plug for hassle-free emptying after wet use.
Washable & Reusable Filter – Environment-friendly design with easily washable filters for long-term use.
